A

addEntry() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
Adds into the address book, the newly created Entry object returned from createEntry() method.
Address - Class in com.simpleaddressbook
This class consists of methods to create, or make changes to, an Address object to be used in the Entry class.
Address() - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
The default constructor which initializes the member variables to zero values.
Address(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
This constructor initializes the member variables to user input values.
AddressBook - Class in com.simpleaddressbook
This class consists of methods to create, or make changes to, an AddressBook object to be used in the AddressBookManager class.
AddressBook() - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
The default constructor initializes a new address book which is an arraylist of entries.
AddressBookManager - Class in com.simpleaddressbook
This class consists of methods to perform serialization on address book files as well as provide interactive menus.
AddressBookManager() - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBookManager
The default constructor which initializes the member variables to zero values.

C

com.simpleaddressbook - package com.simpleaddressbook
 
compareTo(Entry) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Entry
Overrides the default compareTo() method to compare two Entry objects' zip codes by default then breaking ties with their names.
compareTo(Name) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
Overrides the default compareTo() method to compare two Name objects' hexadecimal values of their last names initially then breaking ties with their first names.
createEntry() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
Prompts user to input first name, last name, street address, city, state, zip code, and phone number and creates an Entry object with the values.

D

deleteEntry() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
Prompts user to input first name and last name of an entry to be deleted.
Deletes an existing entry if the first name and last name inputs matches the entry's values.

E

editEntries() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
Prompts user to input first name and last name of an entry to edit.
If the entry exists, provides the user with a menu to select what field of the Entry object to edit, and allows the user to make changes to the corresponding field.
Exits the entry edit mode if input is not an integer or is not among the available choices.
Entry - Class in com.simpleaddressbook
This class consists of methods to create, or make changes to, an Entry object to be used in the AddressBook class.
Entry() - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.Entry
The default constructor which initializes the member variables to zero values.
Entry(Name, Address, String) - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.Entry
This constructor initializes the member variables to user input values.
equals(Object) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
Overrides the default equals() method to check if it is being compared with itself, an object of another class, or another Name object.

F

fileMenu() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBookManager
Provides the user with a File menu and performs the corresponding function of the selection made.

G

getAddress() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Entry
Returns the Address object of the entry.
getAddressBook() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
Returns the arraylist of entries, which is the address book.
getCity() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Returns the currently listed city in the entry.
getFirstName() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
Returns the currently listed first name of the entry.
getLastName() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
Returns the currently listed last name of the entry.
getName() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Entry
Returns the Name object of the entry.
getPhone() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Entry
Returns the phone number string of the entry.
getState() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Returns the currently listed state in the entry.
getStreetAddress() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Returns the currently listed street address in the entry.
getZip() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Returns the currently listed zip code in the entry.

M

Main - Class in com.simpleaddressbook
The driver class which initializes a new AddressBookManager object.
Main() - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Main
 

N

Name - Class in com.simpleaddressbook
This class consists of methods to create, or make changes to, a Name object to be used in the Entry class.
Name() - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
The default constructor which initializes the member variables to zero values.
Name(String, String) - Constructor for class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
This constructor initializes the member variables to user input values.

P

printEntries() - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
Outputs the entries in the address book or outputs that the address book is empty if there are no existing entries.

S

setCity(String) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Sets the user input city name.
setFirstName(String) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
Sets the user input first name.
setLastName(String) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Name
Sets the user input last name.
setPhone(String) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Entry
Sets the user input phone number.
setState(String) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Sets the user input state name.
setStreetAddress(String) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Sets the user input street address.
setZip(String) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.Address
Sets the user input zip code.
sortEntries(int) - Method in class com.simpleaddressbook.AddressBook
If the parameter sortType is 1, sorts the entries in the address book by last names and breaking ties with first names.
Else, sorts the entries by zip codes, breaking ties with the names.
